item.title: Powershell Transcript logging
item.description: I have recently started keeping a track of all my PowerShell. Just a nice simple update. So, I decided to create a “simple” PowerShell script that would keep a track of all my transcripts. The script would create a file name based on date and place the transcript file in a folder of your choice, this is hard-coded in the script and can be easily modified. Hope you like it and find it useful.
